metadata.inclusion:
1. Have Z-WaveTM Controller entered inclusion mode.
2. Pressing button three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.
3. After add successful, the device will wake to receive the setting command from Z-WaveTM Controller about 20 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
1. Have Z-WaveTM Controller entered exclusion mode.
2. Pressing button three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode.
Node ID has been removed.
metadata.reset:
1. Pressing button four times within 1.5 seconds and do not release the button in the 4th pressed.
2. After 3 secands and release the button within 2 seconds.
3. IDs are removed and all settings will reset to factory default
